# KernelBench Placeholder

Populate this directory by cloning and pinning KernelBench:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/ScalingIntelligence/KernelBench.git external/KernelBench
cd external/KernelBench
git checkout <pinned-commit>
```

KITE adapters expect KernelBench task exports under this path or a custom `--kernelbench-root`.
